title: Wangscape options schema
description: Specifies how Wangscape should convert a set of terrain tiles into corner Wang tilesets.

TileFormat.title: Tile format schema
TileFormat.description: Specifies the format of Wangscape's input and output tiles.

Resolution.title: Tile resolution
Resolution.description: Specifies the width and height of the square tiles Wangscape will operate on.

Colours.title: Tile colours schema
Colours.description: Specifies whether a schema uses RGB or greyscale tiles.

BitDepth.title: Bit depth schema
BitDepth.description: Specifies the bit depth of Wangscape's input and output tiles.

FileType.title: File type schema
FileType.description: Specifies the file type of Wangscape's input and output tiles.

OutputDirectory.title: Output directory schema.
OutputDirectory.description: Specifies the directory where Wangscape should write the output tiles (may be wiped first!)

Terrains.title: Terrains schema
Terrains.description: Specifies the names and textures of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.

^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+$.title: Terrain schema
^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+$.description: Specifies the name and texture of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.

FullName.title: Full name schema
FullName.description: Specifies the full name of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.

ShortName.title: Short name schema
ShortName.description: Specifies the short name of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.

FileName.title: File name schema
FileName.description: Specifies the file in which the texture of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles can be found.

OffsetX.title: X offset schema
OffsetX.description: Specifies the horizontal offset of the terrain tile's texture in the input image, divided by the tile resolution.

OffsetY.title: Y offset schema
OffsetY.description: Specifies the vertical offset of the terrain tile's texture in the input image, divided by the tile resolution.

Cliques.title: Cliques schema
Cliques.description: Specifies terrain type sets for which corner Wang tilesets will be generated.

items.title: Clique schema
items.description: Specifies a set of 2-4 terrain types for which a corner Wang tileset will be generated.

items.title: Clique item schema
items.description: Specifies a terrain type by its key in the Terrains property.

BorderOffsets.title: Border offsets schema
BorderOffsets.description: Lists border offsets for ordered pairs of terrain types that can neighbour each other.

items.title: Border offset schema
items.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrain types that can neighbour each other and the corresponding horizontal and vertical border offsets.

Terrains.title: Border offset identifier schema
Terrains.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrain types.

items.title: Terrain identifier schema
items.description: Specifies a terrain type as a key in #/Terrains.
